file.content:
"use client"; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"; import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { Mail, MessageCircle, Building2, Users, Clock, CheckCircle, } from "lucide-react"; import Link from "next/link"; import { Header } from "@/components/landing/Header"; import { Footer } from "@/components/landing/Footer"; import { useState } from "react"; const benefits = [ { icon: Users, title: "Custom Team Pricing", description: "Volume discounts for teams of 5+", }, { icon: Building2, title: "Enterprise Features", description: "SSO, dedicated support, custom integrations", }, { icon: Clock, title: "Priority Support", description: "Dedicated account manager and fast response times", }, ]; export default function ContactPage() { const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", company: "", teamSize: "", message: "", }); const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); // In production, this would send to your backend console.log("Form submitted:", formData); setSubmitted(true); }; const handleChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; return (
{/* Hero section */} Enterprise & Teams

Contact Sales

Looking for team pricing or enterprise features? Let's talk about how SPLICE can accelerate your team's video production workflow.

{/* Contact Form */} Get in Touch {submitted ? (

Thanks for reaching out!

We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

) : (

"use client"; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"; import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { Mail, MessageCircle, Building2, Users, Clock, CheckCircle, } from "lucide-react"; import Link from "next/link"; import { Header } from "@/components/landing/Header"; import { Footer } from "@/components/landing/Footer"; import { useState } from "react"; const benefits = [ { icon: Users, title: "Custom Team Pricing", description: "Volume discounts for teams of 5+", }, { icon: Building2, title: "Enterprise Features", description: "SSO, dedicated support, custom integrations", }, { icon: Clock, title: "Priority Support", description: "Dedicated account manager and fast response times", }, ]; export default function ContactPage() { const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", company: "", teamSize: "", message: "", }); const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); // In production, this would send to your backend console.log("Form submitted:", formData); setSubmitted(true); }; const handleChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; return (
{/* Hero section */} Enterprise & Teams

Contact Sales

Looking for team pricing or enterprise features? Let's talk about how SPLICE can accelerate your team's video production workflow.

{/* Contact Form */} Get in Touch {submitted ? (

Thanks for reaching out!

We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

) : (

content.text:
The contact form has been wired to the API endpoint. Here is a summary of the changes made to `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-website/src/app/contact/page.tsx`:

**Changes made:**

1. **Added new state variables** (lines 41-42):
   - `isLoading` - tracks when the form is submitting
   - `error` - stores any error message to display

2. **Updated `handleSubmit` function** (lines 51-76):
   - Sets `isLoading` to true and clears any previous error
   - Makes a POST fetch to `/api/contact` with JSON body
   - On success: sets `submitted` to true (showing the existing success UI)
   - On error: extracts error message from response or uses a fallback
   - Uses `finally` block to ensure `isLoading` is reset

3. **Added error display** (lines 217-221):
   - Shows a styled error message above the submit button when an error occurs
   - Uses red styling consistent with the dark theme

4. **Updated submit button** (lines 222-228):
   - Added `disabled={isLoading}` to prevent double submissions
   - Added disabled styling classes
   - Button text changes to "Sending..." while loading
